summary: This is an email chain from August 1, 2019, regarding the discovery of a previously unaccounted-for 'Oath' document during the comparison of subpoena returns with the FBI. The document is to be placed in a second production folder, indicating it is part of legal evidence handling in the Epstein case.

events.title: Discovery of Oath Document
events.description: During the process of comparing subpoena returns with the FBI, an 'Oath' document was identified that was not previously accounted for in the production.

keyFacts: An 'Oath' document related to the Epstein case was discovered on August 1, 2019, during a comparison of subpoena returns with the FBI.
The document was not previously included in the evidence production, indicating a potential oversight or new discovery.
The email instructs that a copy be placed in a 'second production folder,' suggesting ongoing evidence management in the legal proceedings.
